mapper.sql: id, comp_id, user_id, user_name, work_place, job_number, date_join, conversion_date, date_left, create_id, create_user, create_time, update_id, update_user, update_time, status
mapper.select: SELECT id, comp_id, user_id, user_name, work_place, job_number, date_join, conversion_date, date_left FROM sys_staff_info WHERE STATUS != 2 AND user_id = #{userId} AND comp_id = #{compId}
SELECT sui.id FROM sys_user_info sui JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON ssi.user_id = sui.id WHERE ssi.comp_id = #{companyId} and ssi.status != 2 and sui.status != -1

SELECT sui.user_name, sui.phone_number, sui.email, sui.nickname, sui.avatar, sui.prov_city_district, sjp.position_name, sci.company_name FROM sys_user_info sui JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON sui.id = ssi.user_id LEFT JOIN union_staff_position usp ON usp.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_job_position sjp ON sjp.id = usp.position_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_info sci on sci.id = ssi.comp_id
ssi.status != -1 and open_id = #{openId}

SELECT sci.company_name, ssi.id staffId, sui.user_name, sui.gender, sui.phone_number, sui.email, sui.nickname, sui.avatar, sui.birthday, sui.certificate_card, sui.certificate_card_address, sui.prov_city_district, sui.contact_address, sui.register_time, ssi. STATUS, sui.nation, sui.ancestral, urs.role_name, sdi.depart_name, sjp.position_name FROM sys_user_info sui JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON sui.id = ssi.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_info sci ON sci.id = ssi.comp_id LEFT JOIN union_role_staff urs ON urs.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN union_staff_depart usd ON usd.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_department_info sdi ON usd.department_id = sdi.id and sdi.status = 1 LEFT JOIN union_staff_position usp ON usp.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN sys_job_position sjp ON sjp.id = usp.position_id and sjp.status = 1
ssi.status != -1 and ssi.id = #{id}

SELECT urs.role_id FROM sys_staff_info ssi LEFT JOIN union_role_staff urs ON urs.staff_id = ssi.id
ssi.status != -1 and ssi.comp_id = #{companyId} and ssi.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT ca.id AS id, ca.company_id AS compId, sci.company_name AS compcompanyName, ssi.user_name AS userName, sui.phone_number AS phone, sjp.position_name AS positionName, sdi.depart_name AS departName, ssi.id AS staffId FROM company_admin ca JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON ssi.id=ca.staff_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_info sui ON sui.id=ssi.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_info sci ON sci.id=ca.company_id LEFT JOIN union_staff_position usp ON usp.staff_id = ca.staff_id LEFT JOIN sys_job_position sjp ON sjp.id = usp.position_id LEFT JOIN union_staff_depart usd ON usd.staff_id = ca.staff_id LEFT JOIN sys_department_info sdi ON sdi.id = usd.department_id
ssi.status != -1
and ssi.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{dto.userName},'%')

SELECT ssi.id as staffId, ssi.user_id as userId, ssi.id com_id as companyId, usd.department_id as deptId, usp.position_id as postId, FROM sys_staff_info ssi LEFT JOIN union_staff_depart usd ON usd.staff_id = ssi.id LEFT JOIN union_staff_position usp ON usp.staff_id = ssi.id
ssi.status != -1 and ssi.id = #{staffId}
